name: The Construct
description:
New character - The Construct! 

RECENT CHANGES:
v0.9.991 
- Challenge 1 cycle effects now work correctly.
- Challenge 2 made slightly less punishing.
- Challenge 3 added!
- Toggling Overheated Expansion no longer requires restart.
- Minor rewording & UX.

v0.9.99
- Challenge relics no longer considered starter rarity.

=============================

EXTRA FEATURES (Enable in Config Menu):
Alternate Starter Relic
- Reach Level 1 to unlock a special starter relic!

Challenge Mode
- Makes the game harder in interesting ways.
- Levels 1, 2, and 3 exist.
- Levels 4 and 5 are in development.

Overheated Expansion (Beta)
- Adds 14 new cards.
- Planned: 1 more new card, 2 new relics.
